name: Smakes up to 8 Players!
description:
IMPORTANT! HOW TO PLAY! UP TO 8 PLAYERS!
USE YOUR PHONE TO CONTROL THE SMAKES

To play Smakes with more people,
just enter with your phone to smakes.avix.tv
and enter the 4 digits code to join. 

You can play up to 8 players! 
Try it and tell us what you think
at facebook.com/AvixGames :)

Have a great party!
